channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Big new contracts and revenue growth have these stocks moving

item.title: Peloton ends streak of revenue declines, sending its stock soaring on earnings
item.description: The connected-fitness company also beat bottom-line expectations for the latest quarter.

item.title: S&P 500 inches lower on Thursday as traders brace for big Powell speech, Treasury yields rise: Live updates
item.description: Traders are looking ahead to commentary from Fed Chair Jerome Powell on Friday for further clues about a potential rate cut.

item.title: Home sales rose in July for the first time in five months
item.description: At the end of the month there were 1.33 million homes on the market, an increase of 0.8% from June and 19.8% higher than July 2023.

item.title: Mortgage rates inch down, but home buyers remain ‘lethargic’
item.description: The 30-year mortgage rate is averaging 6.46%, Freddie Mac said in its latest weekly survey on Thursday.

item.title: Treasury yields rise as traders await Powell remarks
item.description: The U.S. 10-year Treasury rose on Thursday as investors looked ahead to remarks from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.

item.title: ‘There’s not a lot of dignity in a dollar bill’: I tip bartenders and coat-check people $1. Does that make me a cheapskate?
item.description: “How much more money are we being asked to give when we buy small items? It’s ridiculous.”

item.title: British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch and Morgan Stanley's Bloomer retrieved from yacht wreckage
item.description: Mike Lynch was one of 22 passengers aboard the Bayesian superyacht, which capsized while anchored off the coast of Sicily.
